Greeting.1: I am not very fond of you, but I'll hear your words.
Greeting.2: I don't have time for idle chatter, so I hope I can expect to hear something important from you.
Greeting.4: Hello. How can I help you?
Greeting.5: Hey. Fire away. I am always glad to share my knowledge with you.

Farewell.1: Farewell. Let's not do this again soon.
Farewell.2: Next time do not come to speak with me so suddenly.
Farewell.5: I am certain that my journey for greater wisdom will cause our paths to cross again. Until then.

Tell Name.3: They call me Oya. I spend most of my days tearing through the jungle like a tempest, in search of greater wisdom.
Tell Name.4: They call me Oya. I spend most of my days tearing through the jungle like a tempest, in search of greater wisdom.
Tell Name.5: They call me Oya. I spend most of my days tearing through the jungle like a tempest, in search of greater wisdom.

Ask_Origin.1: What is your place of origin?
Ask_Origin.2: What is your place of origin?
Ask_Origin.3: What is your place of origin?
Ask_Origin.4: What is your place of origin?
Ask_Origin.5: What is your place of origin?

Tell Origin.1: I have spent the greatest number of years living in the jungle village.
Tell Origin.2: I have spent the greatest number of years living in the jungle village.
Tell Origin.3: I once lived closer to the mountains, but I'm currently a permanent resident of the jungle village.
Tell Origin.4: I once lived closer to the mountains, but I'm currently a permanent resident of the jungle village.
Tell Origin.5: I once lived closer to the mountains, but I'm currently a permanent resident of the jungle village.

Ask About Strength Of.1: I am a little curious about your opinion. Let's here what you think of the strength possesed by HERO.
Ask About Strength Of.2: I doubt you could possibly have a view on this, but how do you view the strength of HERO?
Ask About Strength Of.3: What is your opinion on the strength of HERO?
Ask About Strength Of.4: What is your opinion on the strength of HERO?
Ask About Strength Of.5: What is your opinion on the strength of HERO?

Tell About Strength Of.1: HERO is frail and could not even win a duel against a kid.
Tell About Strength Of.2: HERO is powerless and can barely defend themself.
Tell About Strength Of.3: HERO is tough, but not tough enough to defend others.
Tell About Strength Of.4: HERO is someone that rarely loses a fight.
Tell About Strength Of.5: HERO is a force to be reckoned with and nearly unstoppable.

Ask About Affinity Of.1: Let's here what you think of the likability of HERO?
Ask About Affinity Of.2: I doubt you could possibly have a view on this, but how do you view the likability of HERO
Ask About Affinity Of.3: Do you find that HERO is an agreeable person?
Ask About Affinity Of.4: Do you find that HERO is an agreeable person?
Ask About Affinity Of.5: Do you find that HERO is an agreeable person?

Tell About Affinity Of.1: HERO is one of the worst people in my opinion.
Tell About Affinity Of.2: HERO is not the least bit likable.
Tell About Affinity Of.5: HERO is briliant. Their village is lucky to have them.

Ask About Notoriety Of.1: Let's hear what you think of the achievements of HERO.
Ask About Notoriety Of.2: I doubt you could possibly have an opinion on this, but how do you think people view the accomplishments of HERO?
Ask About Notoriety Of.3: How do you view the accomplishments of HERO?
Ask About Notoriety Of.4: How do you view the accomplishments of HERO?
Ask About Notoriety Of.5: How do you view the accomplishments of HERO?

Tell About Notoriety Of.2: HERO is not known by many outside of their village.
Tell About Notoriety Of.3: HERO is known by the locals for their minor acts of community service.
Tell About Notoriety Of.4: HERO is a household name. They are very famous.
Tell About Notoriety Of.5: HERO has some of the greatest achievements of all!

Ask_To_Form_Alliance.1: How about you and I become allies?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.2: How about you and I become allies?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.3: How about you and I become allies?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.4: How about you and I become allies?
Ask_To_Form_Alliance.5: How about you and I become allies?

Accept Alliance Offer.1: I have no interest in allying with you at present.
Accept Alliance Offer.2: I will consider your offer, but I cannot give you an answer at present.
Accept Alliance Offer.3: Hmm. Why not. I will become your ally.
Accept Alliance Offer.4: I am humbled by your offer. I accept.
Accept Alliance Offer.5: Say no more. I look forward to working with someone brilliant like you.

Confirm Alliance.1: Ah. That's a shame. Well, I predict I will be back to request this of you again in the future.
Confirm Alliance.2: Ah. That's a shame. Well, I predict I will be back to request this of you again in the future.
Confirm Alliance.3: You'll soon realize just how wise a choice becoming my ally was.
Confirm Alliance.4: You'll soon realize just how wise a choice becoming my ally was.
Confirm Alliance.5: You'll soon realize just how wise a choice becoming my ally was.

Advise To Conquer.1: I believe that you should consider conquering HERO.
Advise To Conquer.2: It would be a wise and strategic move to conquer HERO.
Advise To Conquer.3: The wisdom I have gathered has led me to advise you to conquer HERO.
Advise To Conquer.4: I offer you my advice and urge to try your hand at conquering HERO.
Advise To Conquer.5: I offer you my advice and urge to try your hand at conquering HERO.

Take Advice To Conquer.1: HERO hmm. Trying to conquer their village sounds like a terrible idea. I will have no part in that.
Take Advice To Conquer.2: HERO? Really? No can do. I would much rather keep to my own village and not stir up trouble.
Take Advice To Conquer.3: While I do not know you very well, your suggestion has reaffirmed the action that I had already intended to take. So I will take your advice.
Take Advice To Conquer.4: HERO's village as a conquering target? Given that I know of your wisdom for myself, I will put my trust in you and take your advice.
Take Advice To Conquer.5: I highly respect and value your opinion and I will certainly act on your insightful advice.

Advise To Ally With.1: I believe it would be beneficial to you if you ally with HERO
Advise To Ally With.2: I feel like you would be a perfect candidate for an alliance with HERO
Advise To Ally With.3: My friend, I know that you are strong. You should share your strength with HERO
Advise To Ally With.4: My friend, I know that you are strong. You should share your strength with HERO
Advise To Ally With.5: My friend, I know that you are strong. You should share your strength with HERO

Take Advice To Ally With.1: I can't trust you and I wouldn't ally with their village in a million years!
Take Advice To Ally With.2: I do not believe that it is time to consider HERO as a potential ally just yet. I won't be acting on your advice this time.
Take Advice To Ally With.3: An alliance with HERO and their village sounds feasible so I will go to them shortly and do as you suggest.
Take Advice To Ally With.4: You seem to be sincere about this and you do seem rather wise. Forming an alliance with them, couldn't hurt I suppose. I will attempt to make peace with them then.
Take Advice To Ally With.5: I know that I can always trust you to give the greatest advice and this time is no different. I will go attempt to ally with HERO right away.

Advise To Revolt Against.1: I think it would be in your best interests to revolt against HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.2: I cannot stand see you under the oppression of another. You must break free of HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.3: I know that you are not the type of person to sit down, give up, and let others walk all over you. You must break free from HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.4: I know that you are not the type of person to sit down, give up, and let others walk all over you. You must break free from HERO
Advise To Revolt Against.5: I know that you are not the type of person to sit down, give up, and let others walk all over you. You must break free from HERO

Take Advice To Revolt Against.1: HERO has gone too far, but do you honestly think I would take advice on such an important matter from someone like you.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.2: HERO has gone too far, I do not think I should be discussing this with someone like you.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.3: HERO is not very tolerant and it seems very risky to even be talking about this, but I cannot say that I haven't considered revolt.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.4: HERO being gone would help this village prosper, but it just seems so dangerous. I will have to think about this.
Take Advice To Revolt Against.5: HERO will control my people no further! I know you are right. This tyranny can last no longer. The only possible solution I can think of is revolt.

Advise To Destroy.1: I feel like it would most certainly be in your best interests to destroy HERO
Advise To Destroy.2: I feel like it is a good idea for you to destroy nuisances like HERO
Advise To Destroy.3: You know me, I am not usually one to support such violence, but I feel like it should be one of your top priorities to destroy HERO
Advise To Destroy.4: You know me, I am not usually one to support such violence, but I feel like it should be one of your top priorities to destroy HERO
Advise To Destroy.5: You know me, I am not usually one to support such violence, but I feel like it should be one of your top priorities to destroy HERO

Take Advice To Destroy.1: HERO!? You are suggesting I destroy them!? It is possible that this village would be safer if that village was out of the picture entirely. But I know that it is risky.
Take Advice To Destroy.2: HERO is not someone that will be easy to get rid of, but I am not someone to back down from a challenge if the safety of this village is on the line.
Take Advice To Destroy.3: HERO has to go. I usually try to avoid such violence and destruction, but deep down I know that you are right.
Take Advice To Destroy.4: HERO has to go. I usually try to avoid such violence and destruction, but deep down I know that you are right.
Take Advice To Destroy.5: HERO has to go. I usually try to avoid such violence and destruction, but deep down I know that you are right.

Ask_To_Duel.1: I know I will win with ease, but... I challenge you to a duel.
Ask_To_Duel.2: Let's pit your foolishness against my wisdom in a duel.
Ask_To_Duel.3: I challenge you to a duel.
Ask_To_Duel.4: I am seeking to hone my skills and I would like to do just that through a duel with you.
Ask_To_Duel.5: I realize that you are formiddable, but I must face people like you to better myself. Would you duel me?

Accept Duel.1: A duel? You seem serious about this. Alright then. I accept.
Accept Duel.2: Hmmm. You seem formiddable. Let's pit our great minds against one another with our lives on the line then.
Accept Duel.3: No. I would never waste my time dueling you.

Confirm Duel.1: Let us get this duel started then.
Confirm Duel.2: Let us get this duel started then.
Confirm Duel.3: Let us get this duel started then.
Confirm Duel.4: Let us get this duel started then.
Confirm Duel.5: Let us get this duel started then.

Finish Duel.1: I hope you learned about what it means to challenge people to such serious matches.
Finish Duel.2: I hope you learned about what it means to challenge people to such serious matches.
Finish Duel.3: I hope you learned about what it means to challenge people to such serious matches.
Finish Duel.4: I hope you learned about what it means to challenge people to such serious matches.
Finish Duel.5: I hope you learned about what it means to challenge people to such serious matches.

Ask_To_Spar.1: I require a worthless opponent. Let's spar?
Ask_To_Spar.2: I doubt sparring with you will benefit me, but how about it?
Ask_To_Spar.4: Please spar with me so that we may both improve.
Ask_To_Spar.5: Please allow me to see your greatness for myself through a spar.

Accept Spar Request.1: No. I don't think sparring with you at your current level would be beneficial to me.
Accept Spar Request.2: I will not spar with you until I feel that you are both wise and strong enough.
Accept Spar Request.3: I am interested in testing your abilities. Sure. Let us spar.
Accept Spar Request.4: Spar? I think we can both benefit from a little spar. I will take you up on that.
Accept Spar Request.5: I have always wanted to spar with someone brilliant like you! Let's do this.

Confirm Spar.1: Let us begin with this spar then. Don't hold back.
Confirm Spar.2: Let us begin with this spar then. Don't hold back.
Confirm Spar.3: Let us begin with this spar then. Don't hold back.
Confirm Spar.4: Let us begin with this spar then. Don't hold back.
Confirm Spar.5: Let us begin with this spar then. Don't hold back.

Finish Spar.1: I enjoyed sparring with you. I hope you were able to learn something by testing your skills against me.
Finish Spar.2: I enjoyed sparring with you. I hope you were able to learn something by testing your skills against me.
Finish Spar.3: I enjoyed sparring with you. I hope you were able to learn something by testing your skills against me.
Finish Spar.4: I enjoyed sparring with you. I hope you were able to learn something by testing your skills against me.
Finish Spar.5: I enjoyed sparring with you. I hope you were able to learn something by testing your skills against me.

Bribe.1: I really did not want to offer this to you, but here.
Bribe.2: Would you be interested in this gift?
Bribe.3: Here is a little something from me. Please accept it. You deserve it.
Bribe.4: Here is a little something from me. Please accept it. You deserve it.
Bribe.5: Here is a little something from me. Please accept it. You deserve it.

Accept Bribe.1: I would rather ally with an enemy before taking a bribe from you!
Accept Bribe.2: Are you actually trying to bribe me? Well, its not going to work.
Accept Bribe.3: Hmm. I will take you up on that.
Accept Bribe.4: If you are trying to get on my good side, then it worked.
Accept Bribe.5: You are too kind. I will gladly accept your gift.

Ask_To_Join_Party.1: Would you be willing to allow me to join you?
Ask_To_Join_Party.2: I would greatly appreciate if you would allow me to stand by your side.
Ask_To_Join_Party.3: Please, allow me to be in your company. I would be eternally grateful.
Ask_To_Join_Party.4: Please, allow me to be in your company. I would be eternally grateful.
Ask_To_Join_Party.5: Please, allow me to be in your company. I would be eternally grateful.

Accept Into Party.1: I am not sure I am ready to accept more party members at this time.
Accept Into Party.2: You seem like a smart and capable person. You are in.
Accept Into Party.3: With you on my side, we will be able to protect hundreds of people. Welcome aboard.
Accept Into Party.4: With you on my side, we will be able to protect hundreds of people. Welcome aboard.
Accept Into Party.5: With you on my side, we will be able to protect hundreds of people. Welcome aboard.

Recruit_For_Party.1: Would you like to join my party?
Recruit_For_Party.2: My party could use a mind like yours. Would you care to join?
Recruit_For_Party.3: You seem exceedingly smart and strong. I humbly ask you to join me.
Recruit_For_Party.4: You seem exceedingly smart and strong. I humbly ask you to join me.
Recruit_For_Party.5: You seem exceedingly smart and strong. I humbly ask you to join me.

Join Party.1: I will consider your offer, but I cannot say at the moment.
Join Party.2: I appreciate the offer and I gladly accept.
Join Party.3: Thank you so very much for allowing me to stand by your side. I wholeheartedly accept.
Join Party.4: Thank you so very much for allowing me to stand by your side. I wholeheartedly accept.
Join Party.5: Thank you so very much for allowing me to stand by your side. I wholeheartedly accept.

Compliment.1: You seem like a capable person.
Compliment.2: You seem like a capable person.
Compliment.3: You seem like a capable person.
Compliment.4: Wisdom and strength are two words that I feel describe you perfectly.
Compliment.5: Everything about you, from your accomplishments to your very being is awe-inspiring.

Thank.1: Was that supposed to be a compliment? Well, I am not amused!
Thank.2: Flattery will get you nowhere with me.
Thank.4: I appreciate your kind words. They have brightened my day.
Thank.5: Hearing that from you really lifts my spirits. Many thanks.

Grovel.1: I dont want to, but I will bow to you on my knees.
Grovel.2: Please allow me to clean your blade for you.
Grovel.3: I would be humbled if you would allow me to prostrate myself before you.
Grovel.4: I would be humbled if you would allow me to prostrate myself before you.
Grovel.5: I would be humbled if you would allow me to prostrate myself before you.

Accept Plea.1: You look even more unsightly than usual when you are groveling, but the ground sure does suit you.
Accept Plea.2: Grovel all you want. You won't get me to budge.
Accept Plea.3: Please get off of your knees. Do not shame yourself.
Accept Plea.4: I am humbled by the fact that you would prostrate yourself before me.
Accept Plea.5: You don't have to grovel. We are friends.

Advise To Train With.1: I belive that your village would be safer if you trained its troops with HERO
Advise To Train With.2: I think that it should be a high priority for you to train with HERO
Advise To Train With.3: I suggest that you bolster your defenses through training with HERO
Advise To Train With.4: I suggest that you bolster your defenses through training with HERO
Advise To Train With.5: I suggest that you bolster your defenses through training with HERO

Take Advice To Train With.1: HERO!? Train me? I believe I know when I should train the village and its soldiers. I do not need your advice.
Take Advice To Train With.2: HERO!? Train me? Are you implying that this village is weak? I think I know how strong they are more than you do.
Take Advice To Train With.3: HERO? Train me? Hmm. It cannot hurt to always be a bit more prepared. I will consider it.
Take Advice To Train With.4: HERO? Train me? I do worry about whether we are prepared for an attack or not. I will definitely consider training.
Take Advice To Train With.5: HERO? Train me? I know you're right. This village is vunerable in its current state. I will definitely think about training in order to bolster our defenses.

Advise To Fight.1: I believe it would be prudent of you to fight HERO.
Advise To Fight.2: I think fighting with HERO could be beneficial to you.
Advise To Fight.3: You should fight with HERO and rise to even greater heights in strength.
Advise To Fight.4: You should fight with HERO and rise to even greater heights in strength.
Advise To Fight.5: You should fight with HERO and rise to even greater heights in strength.

Take Advice To Fight.1: Getting into a fight with HERO sounds like an unwise course of action. Take your bad advice elsewhere because I have no intention of following it.
Take Advice To Fight.2: I will not be taking your advice. You have yet to prove yourself to be wise.
Take Advice To Fight.3: A fight with HERO? Maybe leaving the jungle once in awhile to sharpen my skills would be a good idea... I will go to fight HERO.
Take Advice To Fight.4: I don't know what caused you to suggest that I fight HERO, but I will do it because I trust you.
Take Advice To Fight.5: You are one of the most trustworthy people that I know and so I will act on your advice immediately.

Advise To Send Peace Offering To.1: I believe it would be prudent of you to send a peace offering to HERO.
Advise To Send Peace Offering To.2: You should send a peace offering to HERO in order to earn their favor.
Advise To Send Peace Offering To.3: I would hate to see you get into trouble with HERO. You should try sending them a peace offering.
Advise To Send Peace Offering To.4: I would hate to see you get into trouble with HERO. You should try sending them a peace offering.
Advise To Send Peace Offering To.5: I would hate to see you get into trouble with HERO. You should try sending them a peace offering.

Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.1: My apologies, but I do not think your advice is worth acting on.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.2: Your advice is not bad, but I am not sure that you are trustworthy so I won't act on your word.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.3: Hmm. Your words seem to be free of ill intent. I will try taking your advice.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.4: As an advocate of peace and as your friend, I will take your advice.
Take Advice To Send Peace Offering To.5: If you truly believe that a peace offering will lessen tensions between our villages then I will believe in you and send one.

Request_Teaching.1: I would like to be taught by you.
Request_Teaching.2: I know that you are both wise and strong, and would greatly appreciate it if you could share some of that strength and wisdom with me.
Request_Teaching.3: I know that you are both wise and strong, and would greatly appreciate it if you could share some of that strength and wisdom with me.
Request_Teaching.4: I know that you are both wise and strong, and would greatly appreciate it if you could share some of that strength and wisdom with me.
Request_Teaching.5: I know that you are both wise and strong, and would greatly appreciate it if you could share some of that strength and wisdom with me.

Teach.1: I will not be teaching you a thing. You are nowhere near ready to learn from me yet.
Teach.3: I suppose teaching you wouldn't hurt. Let us begin this lesson.
Teach.4: Hmm. You seem like you would make a good student. Very well then. I will teach you.
Teach.5: Certainly. I would love to teach you. I feel that you would make great use of my skill.

Teach Spin.1: I will teach you how to spin through the obstacles in your path like a tempest.
Teach Spin.2: I will teach you how to spin through the obstacles in your path like a tempest.
Teach Spin.3: I will teach you how to spin through the obstacles in your path like a tempest.
Teach Spin.4: I will teach you how to spin through the obstacles in your path like a tempest.
Teach Spin.5: I will teach you how to spin through the obstacles in your path like a tempest.

Teach Spin 1.1: Concentrate on your balance and hold your blade out taut. Yes, that's the way...
Teach Spin 1.2: Concentrate on your balance and hold your blade out taut. Yes, that's the way...
Teach Spin 1.3: Concentrate on your balance and hold your blade out taut. Yes, that's the way...
Teach Spin 1.4: Concentrate on your balance and hold your blade out taut. Yes, that's the way...
Teach Spin 1.5: Concentrate on your balance and hold your blade out taut. Yes, that's the way...

Teach Spin 2.1: Use one foot to pivot and the other to control your speed... Easy now, try to keep a steady swing. Great.
Teach Spin 2.2: Use one foot to pivot and the other to control your speed... Easy now, try to keep a steady swing. Great.
Teach Spin 2.3: Use one foot to pivot and the other to control your speed... Easy now, try to keep a steady swing. Great.
Teach Spin 2.4: Use one foot to pivot and the other to control your speed... Easy now, try to keep a steady swing. Great.
Teach Spin 2.5: Use one foot to pivot and the other to control your speed... Easy now, try to keep a steady swing. Great.

Teach Spin 3.1: You have completed my lesson. Use your new skill wisely. Press the 'L' key to use it.

Teach Spin 3.5: You have completed my lesson. Use your new skill wisely. Press the 'L' key to use it.

Already Taught.1: I have nothing else to teach you at present.
Already Taught.2: I have nothing else to teach you at present.
Already Taught.3: I have nothing else to teach you at present.
Already Taught.4: I have nothing else to teach you at present.
Already Taught.5: I have nothing else to teach you at present.

Offer_Teaching.1: I wouldn't mind imparting some of my knowledge upon you if you are alright with it.
Offer_Teaching.2: I believe I could teach you many things that would be of use to you.
Offer_Teaching.3: I suppose teaching you wouldn't hurt.
Offer_Teaching.4: Please allow me to teach you. It would be mutually beneficial.
Offer_Teaching.5: I would love to teach you. I can probably learn some things myself by teaching you.

Accept Teaching.1: Hahaha I honestly would rather be taught by a rat than the likes of you.
Accept Teaching.2: I doubt you could teach me anything.
Accept Teaching.3: Oh, I suppose being taught by you could not hurt.
Accept Teaching.4: I would be more than happy to accept your teaching.
Accept Teaching.5: I gladly accept your offer. I would love to be taught by someone like you.

Boast.1: I am told that my wisdom is unrivaled.
Boast.2: I have the strength and the wisdom to protect the whole jungle village.
Boast.3: I am the wisest person around. Nobody can outwit me.
Boast.4: I am the wisest person around. Nobody can outwit me.
Boast.5: I am the wisest person around. Nobody can outwit me.

Congratulate.5: Wow, you are amazing! I am in awe at your brilliance.

Intimidate.1: You think you are wise, but you will get into trouble with me until you expand your knowledge.
Intimidate.2: You should watch out. Many people including myself could take you out whenever we please.
Intimidate.3: You should watch out. Many people including myself could take you out whenever we please.
Intimidate.4: You should watch out. Many people including myself could take you out whenever we please.
Intimidate.5: You should watch out. Many people including myself could take you out whenever we please.

Talk Back.1: You could never scare me, dullard.
Talk Back.3: I will be more careful when I speak with you from now on.
Talk Back.4: You don't have to tell me twice. I know that I cannot be careless around you.

Insult.2: You are a third rate warrior, with a fourth rate weapon.
Insult.3: You are a third rate warrior, with a fourth rate weapon.
Insult.4: You are a third rate warrior, with a fourth rate weapon.
Insult.5: You are a third rate warrior, with a fourth rate weapon.

Defend Self.3: That's not a nice thing to say.
Defend Self.5: I am surprised that such nasty words have passed your lips. I am shocked.

Quest_Complete.3: Thanks for completing my quest and helping me out.
Quest_Complete.4: Thanks for completing my quest and helping me out.
Quest_Complete.5: Thanks for completing my quest and helping me out.
